orig_text:
Network Working Group                                    D. Eastlake 3rd
Request for Comments: 4635                         Motorola Laboratories
Category: Standards Track                                    August 2006
correct_text:
Network Working Group                                    D. Eastlake 3rd
Request for Comments: 4635                         Motorola Laboratories
Updates 2845
Category: Standards Track                                    August 2006
notes: This RFC, which I authored, clearly updates the Original RFC 2845 for TSIG: It makes it MANDATORY to implement HMAC-SHA1 and HMAC-SHA256 if you claim to support TSIG. It defines a new TSIG error code, BADTRUC, and specifies when it is to be returned. This are *significant* *normative* updates to RFC 2845. The RFC index for 2845 and 4635 should be updated to show this.

Simple typo (transposed characters).

2018-06-21: Status changed from "Held for Document Update" to "Verified".
